question: [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/manage.move] [Function: set_incentive_v3_max_reward_rate_by_rule_id()] [Type Mismatch] Can generic T not match rule's asset type, setting max rate on wrong pool? (High)
